name: FormsForWeb Extensible Form Package
summary: An XFP file is an eXtensible Form Package created by Lucom FormsForWeb. It contains all the assets needed to generate a FormsForWeb packet ( .FFWP file). XFP files are Zip-compressed and can be decompressed with any Zip utility to view their contents.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Change .xfp to .zip ; open with any Zip-decompression utility
